casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Clyde Edward SPENCER. No. 137P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Rick Shaffer, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of March 2008 by Defendant to allow Defendant to make a timely appeal according to the time the Defendant received the opinion from N.C. Court of Appeals:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
